item.title: Elon Musk Reacts To US Travel Ban On Former EU Commissioner: '...Gets His Dessert'
item.description: Elon Musk reacted on X to the U.S. travel restrictions on five European officials, including former EU Commissioner Thierry Breton. read more

item.title: Are Markets Open On Christmas? Here's What's Open, What's Closed On December 25
item.description: Christmas brings closures and adjusted timings for federal institutions, banks, stock market, shipping carriers, and retail giants. read more

item.title: SOBR Safe Shares Slide Over 14% After Hours Following $2 Million Private Placement

item.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Faces NHTSA Probe Into Model 3 Emergency Door Release
item.description: The NHTSA is investigating Tesla Model 3 vehicles due to concerns about emergency door release issues. read more
